reviews.review: Przyjemna gra. Gra bardzo ma fajną fabułę dzięki której można pograć w nią kilka razy! Muzyka w tej grze to złoto. Polecam.
광광 울었습니다. 존경합니다 감사합니다 포탈 제작진분들

O famoso jogo Portal 2, segue o mesmo raciocínio do primeiro jogo da franquia, Portal; mas ainda assim se destaca facilmente pela ótima quantidade de fases disponíveis, conteúdos criados por outros jogadores e a parte mais divertida do jogo: Multjogador Co-op. Possui gráficos muito bonitos, boa ambientação e novas mecânicas de Puzzles que enriquece ainda mais seu divertimento. Recomendo.
Amazing game 100% recommend spent many many hours playing this game back in the day on Xbox 360.

Велеколепная Игра! Я всё ещё веню себя что не прошёл её намного раньше, и удевляюсь как я не подвергся спойлерами! Геймплей хороший (багов небыло замечено)! Графика хорошая (для того времени да и даже сейчас это не плохая Графика)! Сюжет - Душевный и интересный, лично мне история понравилась : я не мог перестать играть !
Всем советую!
A timeless classic. Get it on sale (it's dirt cheap)
一款2011的游戏，放到现在也非常好玩
Cool game, especially when you've got someone to play coop with.
Very fun game, especially with a buddy.
oyunun mükkemmel bi hikayesi var oyun sadece bu hikaye için bile alınır üstüne mükkemmel oynanış da gelince oyun harika oluyor.Hikayeyi bitirdikden sonra arkadaşınızla coop'u oynaya bilirsiniz.
game is legendary, funny, enjoyable and works even if you haven't played portal. my small brain had trouble with some puzzles but its def worth the price

이거 이상으로 새로운 게임을 아직도 본적이 없다.
창의적인 게임의 모범
She turns herself into a potato, funniest crap i've ever seen!

Speedy thing comes in...
             ...speedy thing comes out.
买来双人游玩，很有意思，让我知道我有多傻逼，和我的同伴有多搞笑
Excellent. Worth it. Memorable. Quality writing. Refined gameplay. J.K. Simmons. Sarcastic. Yes.

This game is a fun puzzle game with a great plot! It fixes problems with the original portal like story and length while adding new mechanics in such as Repulsion Gel that makes you jump high and make blocks bounce around the room. This game is worth getting and is a must play.

Very nice and fun game for such low price. (~1,50$ on sale)
Game has quite nice coop, workshop support and short singleplayer story for 8-9 hours. 
Graphic is okay, music is adorable. Sometimes it's hard to find a proper way, but that's not big problem.
Quite enjoyable ambient and story with funny Ai robots.

Definitely worth to play. ^_^
Top notch game, don't play it often because playing with friends is way more entertaining, especially when you mess with them.
I loved playing co-op back when it came out. It was fun to play with my sister.

"This isn't just a regular game, It's the product of the greatest minds of a generation, working together with the express purpose of creating the bestest game there ever was"
Good length and pacing. A fun experience overall. Lots of fun and challenging puzzles.

This game makes me feel like I am the most stupid and unintelligent person on the planet.

At the same time, this game makes me brain blast so much that for a split second I am the smartest human being to ever walk the planet.

9/10
Great Game. Fun. Puzzle solving Nirvana. Very Funny. Great Story.

[h1]제 인생에서 플레이한 명작 게임중 TOP 3 안에 드는 게임입니다.[/h1]
7년 전 중학생때 스테이지 클리어 할 때마다 느낀 그 짜릿함이 지금 다시 클리어 할때 그대로 생생히 느껴질 정도로 명불허전이라는 표현이 생각나네요.

[h1]플레이 방식은 1이랑 동일하며 난이도가 전반적으로 상승했습니다.[/h1]
[h1]스토리는 여전히 명작라인에서 거론될 정도이고[/h1] 

멀티플레이인 CO-OP플레이 또한 재밌기로 유명합니다.

It's the fantastic sequel to the iconic action-platform-comedy-puzzler Portal!

A solid game fun with friends. Quite a bit outdated and not updated but still alright for my standards. Fun to mess around but once you beat the story (singleplayer and multiplayer) there is not much to do. Great Game!
One of the best puzzle games EVER
most groundbreaking game ever released. took the ideas from portal 1 and uses them in the most genius ways possible. amazing.

整體很有趣
但到底是誰覺得開發人員模式不能存檔是個好主意
凝膠沒跳好整段重來直接吐血

Portal 2 oyunu elinizde ki portal yaratıcı silah ile farklı tarzdaki bölümleri geçmeniz için tasarlanmış bir oyundur. İsterseniz yanınıza bir arkadaşınızı alıp bütün oyunu kafa yorarak rahatça bitirebilirsiniz. Mantığı çok basit ve rahatça kavrayabilirsiniz. Zaman geçirebileceğiniz harika bir oyun. 

Sadece Oynanış Üzerinden Puanım: 9/10
it is very challenging, interesting, and it builds a nice plot
i was told to describe or put something in this box. So I am going to put "Something"
Masterpiece way ahead of games like it for its time
it's like you took portal 1, an already great game, and made it better in every way possible. 10/10
its a classic and still amazing to this day

Amazing game!! Keeps the mind active and really makes you analyze what's around you. I played portal 1 so i didn't find this one too hard but i can see a new player to the game could get stuck on some levels. Finished in just under 6 hours and i felt i went decently fast. I did get stuck in a room in chapter 7 for about 15 minutes but then figured my way out. Great story and voice over, definatly will make you chuckle acouple of time throughout the story. The final boss fight was really fun! I do kinda wish there were some kind of smaller bosses along the way with the same type of mechanics. I give this game a solid 9 out of 10 and will play Portal 3 if they ever make one
S E N S A C I O N A L
What an amazing game. Short but so funny and sometimes really challenging. Good Story for that lengh.
